summary.p: Description based on the digital images available on Gallica.

supportDesc.foliation: Left-marginal Tamil numerals foliation, first folio unfoliated (U2).

collation.desc: the front cover. BnF shelfmark sticker on front cover, recto.
3 folios = front guard leaves. Blank recto verso.
98 folios = Nalaccakkavartti Katai: Text. Tamil foliation {1}, 2-98.
5 folios = back guard leaves. Blank recto verso.

handNote.desc: Mostly unblackened. Only the first pages are blackened.

additions.desc: BnF current shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 415 (front cover, recto).
Burnouf sticker BURN. 168 pasted on f[1]r
Arabic foliation 98 added in black ink (f98r).

Sticker pasted on f[5]v:
53
Manuscrit tamoul en prose dont j'ignore le titre mais dont le contenu ma parait être religieux et légendaire. Ce grand et beau manuscrit est complet; il se compose de 98 olles; l'écriture n'a pas été noircie mais elle n'en est pas moins très lisible.
Tamoul n° 415
nalacakkavaṟtti
The lines 2-6 are by Burnouf and are also found in his library catalogue (p. 346, no. 168). The lines 1, 7 and 8 are by another hand.

Sticker pasted on f[5]v:
Manuscrit tamoul en prose dont j'ignore le titre mais dont le contenu ma parait être religieux et légendaire. D'une écriture belle et lisible.
Also by Burnouf.

binding.p: Pinewood covers apparently fabricated in the BnF.

origin.origDate: No internal date. Dated to circa 1835 by Vinson in Vinson et al. (1866-) and to 1835 by Cabaton (1912), on unstated grounds (presumably Burnouf's provenance). Not after 1852, since part of the collection of Eugène Burnouf (1801-1852).

provenance.p: Owned by Eugène Burnouf (1801-1852). — See S.n. 1854, p. 346, no. 168.

acquisition.p: Acquired, August 2nd, 1854, from “Madame veuve Burnouf”. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 2 = Acquisitions: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1893, no. 4955.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 59, n0. 415.
S.n. 1854. Catalogue des livres imprimés et manuscrits composant la bibliothèque de feu M. Eugène Burnouf. Paris: Duprat. — See p. 346, no. 168.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 95r, no. 385 415.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.
